titles.title: To name the Department of Veterans Affairs outpatient clinic in Ewa Plain, Oahu, Hawaii, as the "Daniel Kahikina Akaka Department of Veterans Affairs Outpatient Clinic".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: 12/19/2013--Introduced. Designates the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) outpatient clinic in Ewa Plain, Oahu, Hawaii, as the "Daniel Kahikina Akaka Department of Veterans Affairs Outpatient Clinic."
